2021.title: QSL103A Picosecond Microchip Laser
2021.description: The QSL103A is a robust, high-powered source of picosecond pulses delivered from a compact laser head.

2021.title: Spectra-Physics Quasar UV80 laser
2021.description: The Quasar UV80 from Spectra-Physics is a UV/Green Hybrid Fiber Laser that operates at a wavelength of 355 nm and uses TimeShift technology which enables pulse energy programmability in the time domain as well as pulse splitting and burst mode operation.

2021.title: Focal-πShaper_1070_Q_HP
2021.description: Focal-πShaper_1070_Q_HP series refractive beam shapers control the intensity distribution of a focused spot.

2021.title: MicroCalibir uncooled thermal camera platform
2021.description: MicroCalibir™ uncooled thermal camera platform features the smallest VGA IR core module on the market, making it ideal for OEM drones, handhelds, helmet-mounted and vehicular integration products.

2021.title: Envise
2021.description: Envise™ the world's first photonic computing platform for AI, offering unmatched performance and energy efficiency to power next-generation computing.

2021.title: See3CAM_CU27 NIR Camera
2021.description: See3CAM_CU27 is a Full HD USB 3.1 Gen 1 camera based on the SONY® STARVIS™ IMX462 sensor that is capable of capturing high-quality images in near-infrared regions.

2021.title: NanoDrop Eight UV-Vis Microvolume Spectrophotometer
2021.description: See3CAM_CU27 is a Full HD USB 3.1 Gen 1 camera based on the SONY® STARVIS™ IMX462 sensor that is capable of capturing high-quality images in near-infrared regions.
2021.url: The compact Thermo Scientific NanoDrop Eight Spectrophotometer measures eight samples at a time in less than 20 seconds. It is an ideal choice for pharma/biotech and academic researchers needing a higher throughput capacity for measuring nucleic acid and protein samples.
